title: Why BuzzFeed fell 40%, EU mandates USB-C, Lab-grown ear transplants, Tom Bradyâ€™s Series B | E1478
description: BuzzFeed is tanking- we talk about what it means for its employees and the company (2:07). Next, we discuss Uber Eats coming for GoldBelly (23:51), then we cover the EU mandating that USB-C ports be standard by 2024 (36:17). We close out the show with our Startup of the Day in the sports space (41:21) and a We Live in the Future in the ear transplant space (49:42).
